author: andreas
content:
Should it clash? Well, no, it should not. Let's see: this "green" is much more yellow than green, but, you're right, I should have pushed the "blue" towards purple. Hmm ... I'm gonna replace the image in a minute ... minutes pass ... done!

Thanks, I really should have seen that myself ðŸ™‚

To all late-comers: the hydrant came out of the camera in sort of a pale-blue, and saturating it, I had not noticed that the resulting blue had a distinct greenish tinge. That together with the yellow-green of the grass did clash. I normally don't change images after publication, certainly not content, but in cases like this I have no qualms ðŸ™‚

Andreas
